details: Dokkaebi, also known as 'Korean goblins', are nature deities or spirits possessing extraordinary powers and abilities that are used to interact with humans, at times playing tricks on them and at times helping them.

challenge.text: ⸢It was too strange to call it a fairy, too evil to call it an angel, and too tranquil to call it a demon. Thus, it was called a '________'.⸥
